meanings.definition: Subjected to a duty or responsibility.
meanings.sent1: The dutied worker always completes his tasks on time.
meanings.sent2: She felt dutied to help her friend in need.
meanings.sent3: The dutied squirrel was in charge of gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The dutied soldier stood guard through the night.
meanings.sent5: The dutied student diligently studied for the exam.

meanings.sent1: The dutied firefighter rushed to the scene of the fire.
meanings.sent2: As a parent, she is dutied to care for her children.
meanings.sent3: The dutied cat made sure to keep the house free of mice.
meanings.sent4: The dutied doctor worked tirelessly to save lives.
meanings.sent5: The dutied teacher guided her students with patience.

meanings.definition: Imposed with a task or assignment.
meanings.sent1: The dutied messenger delivered the urgent message.
meanings.sent2: He felt dutied to complete the project before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The dutied bee buzzed from flower to flower collecting nectar.
meanings.sent4: The dutied chef prepared a delicious meal for the guests.
meanings.sent5: The dutied librarian organized the books on the shelves.
